item.title: More than 100 farmers step up to harvest fields for father diagnosed with ALS
item.description: A farming community came together to harvest hundreds of acres for a father struggling with an ALS diagnosis.

item.title: Bradenton tortoises feature in award-winning Floridian’s photo
item.description: The Suncoast boasts a wide variety of wildlife, from native animals to invasive species.

item.title: Bradenton woman hits two poles, dies
item.description: A 25-year-old Bradenton woman died Sunday morning after losing control on Cortez Road.

item.title: Imelda’s wild path, makes hard turn right chasing Humberto
item.description: Did rare Fujiwhara Effect impact this stunning shift?

item.title: VPD: Man arrested and charged after stabbing stepfather in Valdosta apartment
item.description: A man has been arrested and charged after allegedly stabbing his stepfather at The Grand at Lake Sheri Apartments in Valdosta, according to a Saturday press release from Valdosta police.

item.title: Armed man killed after opening fire during afternoon dismissal at S.L. Mason Elementary Thursday
item.description: Valdosta City Schools released a video statement Friday morning with Superintendent Dr. Craig Lockhart, VPD Chief Leslie Manahan, the elementary school’s principal, Kendrick Moody and others, addressing the incident that occurred Thursday.

item.title: Gulf recreational greater amberjack season closing due to overfishing concerns
item.description: The FWC says that due to overfishing concerns, the Gulf greater amberjack is under a federal rebuilding plan.

item.title: Small plane crashes near Stump Pass
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration responded to small plane crash in Englewood, near the stump pass area.

item.title: Road Reopens After Crash backs up traffic on I-75 near Fruitville
item.description: There is no official word of injuries or deaths from this scene.

item.title: Homicide Investigation Underway
item.description: One person found dead on scene

item.title: Sunny skies with little rain for most of the week
item.description: Drier air moves in. Winds get breezy
